[row id="location" wide_style="yes"] [third_column]

[/third_column] [/row]
[chapter id="menu" header="Get the best BBQ in Town" header_style="8" bg_image_src="1"]
[product_slider] [product_slider_item imgsrc="http://foodtruck.wp.themeforest.createit.pl/bigsmokebbq/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2014/02/sliderphoto-1.png" title="Slow grilled pulled pork burger - with homebrewed beer" subtitle="Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas."] [price_tag left_header=" Slow grilled pulled pork " right_header=" + special twisted fries" above_price_text="just" price="12" sub_price="99" currency="$"] [/product_slider_item]
[product_slider_item imgsrc="http://foodtruck.wp.themeforest.createit.pl/bigsmokebbq/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2014/02/sliderphoto-1.png" title="Slow grilled pulled pork burger - with homebrewed beer" subtitle="Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas."] [price_tag left_header=" Slow grilled pulled pork " right_header=" + special twisted fries" above_price_text="just" price="12" sub_price="99" currency="$"] [/product_slider_item] [/product_slider]
[row inline_style="position:relative;margin-bottom:-55px;z-index:1" ] [img src="http://foodtruck.wp.themeforest.createit.pl/bigsmokebbq/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2014/02/photo-2.png" align="center"] [/row] [spacer] [spacer] [header style="4"]Our recommendations![/header]
[products tag="recommended" limit="3"]
[header style="2"]Whatever you choose![/header] [header level="4" style="3"] Be 100% sure, that our Food is entirely made of biological ingredients [/header] [/chapter]
[chapter id="menu" header="Our tasty meals, have a look!" header_style="1" bg_image_src="2" chapter_pattern_style="2" ornament="true"]
[row] [third_column] [menu cat_name="starters" category_image="sandwich"] [menu cat_name="desserts" style="2" category_image="cupcake"] [/third_column]

[third_column] [menu cat_name="sides" style="4" category_image="taco"] [menu cat_name="beverages" style="4" category_image="drink"] [/third_column] [/row]
[header style="2"]Whatever you choose![/header] [header level="4" style="3"] Be 100% sure, that our Food is entirely made of biological ingredients [/header] [/chapter]
[chapter id="events" top_margin="80" header="Our upcoming event & festivals" header_style="4" bg_image_src="3"]
[row] [event_box slug="the-bbq-palooza"] [/event_box]
[event_box slug="the-bbq-feast"][/event_box] [/row]
[header style="2" bottom_line="true"]Join us at our events[/header] [header level="4" style="3"]We would be more than glad, to see you at our events![/header] [/chapter]
[chapter id="story" chapter_pattern_style="2" background_image_repeat="yes" header="Read our incredible story!" header_style="1" bg_image_src="4"]
[easy_box style="flat"]
[row] [half_column]
[header level="4"]It all started with a ...[/header] [paragraph bigger="yes"] Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo. Quisque sit amet est et sapien ullamcorper pharetra. Vestibulum erat wisi, condimentum sed, commodo vitae, ornare sit amet, wisi. [/paragraph]
[paragraph bigger="yes"] Aenean fermentum, elit eget tincidunt condimentum, eros ipsum rutrum orci, sagittis tempus lacus enim ac dui. Donec non enim in turpis pulvinar facilisis. Ut felis. Praesent dapibus, neque id cursus faucibus, tortor neque egestas augue, eu vulputate magna eros eu erat. [/paragraph]
[paragraph bigger="yes"] Aenean fermentum, elit eget tincidunt condimentum, eros ipsum rutrum orci, sagittis tempus lacus enim ac dui. [/paragraph] [/half_column]

[polaroid_slider_item imgsrc="http://foodtruck.wp.themeforest.createit.pl/bigsmokebbq/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2014/02/smallslider-1.jpg"] [/polaroid_slider_item] [/polaroid_slider] [share_it text="Share it" link="#"] [/half_column] [/row] [/easy_box]
[header style="2" bottom_line="true"]Do you like our story?[/header] [header level="4" style="3"]Please visit our [link link="https://www.facebook.com/createITpl"]facebook page[/link] to know even more[/header] [/chapter]
[chapter id="gallery" bg_image_attachment="scroll" ornament="yes" top_margin="true" chapter_pattern_style="1" header="Have a look in our gallery!" header_style="4" bottom_margin="100"]
[row inline_style="position:relative;margin-top:-30px"] [quarter_column sm="6"] [gallery_group cover_image="http://foodtruck.wp.themeforest.createit.pl/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/gallery-01.jpg" title="Street-Life"]

[gallery_group_item image="http://foodtruck.wp.themeforest.createit.pl/tacos/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2014/02/eventlife_2.png"] [gallery_group_item image="http://foodtruck.wp.themeforest.createit.pl/tacos/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2014/02/eventlife_3.png"] [/gallery_group] [/quarter_column]

[header level="4" style="3"]Follow us on Instagram[/header] [spacer] [img align="center" src="http://foodtruck.wp.themeforest.createit.pl/bigsmokebbq/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2014/02/instagram-btn.png" link="http://instagram.com"] [spacer] [spacer]
[header style="2"]Took a good shot of our truck?[/header] [header level="4" style="3"] We would be very glad if you could send your photos to us! [/header] [/chapter]
[chapter id="contact" top_margin="75" chapter_pattern_style="2" header="Drop us a line!" header_style="1" header_style="4" bg_image_src="6"]
[easy_box style="full"] [header level="4" style="5" easybox_line="yes"]Did you know? We also provide super duper catering![/header]
[row]
[five_twelfths_column] [contact_form easy_box="no"] [/five_twelfths_column]
[one_sixth_column] [/one_sixth_column]
